message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10000 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses lower. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counterproposal. Considering the value of the product to you, I am willing to reduce the price to $9500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to sell the product to you for $9000.
